citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC meeting minutes, including the program review and semiannual inspection, dated September 2020 and
serving as the report to the institutional official, were not signed by the committee. April 2021 IACUC meeting minutes
were not available for review at the time of inspection but in process of preparation. The IACUC must update and sign
reports to the Institutional Official at 6 month intervals, and make them available for review at the time of inspection.
Correct by: next IACUC meeting
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC meeting minutes,  including the program review and semiannual inspection, dated September 2020 and 
serving as the report to the institutional official, were not signed by the committee.  April 2021 IACUC meeting minutes 
were not available for review at the time of inspection but in process of preparation.  The IACUC must update and sign 
reports to the Institutional Official at 6 month intervals, and make them available  for review at the time of inspection. 
 
Correct by: next IACUC meeting 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
